sn56:7.1.1_0: “Mā, bhikkhave, pāpake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyātha, seyyathidaṁ—
sn56:7.1.4_2: vitakkā atthasaṁhitā nādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattanti.
sn56:7.2.3_2: vitakkā atthasaṁhitā ete ādibrahmacariyakā ete nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattanti.
sn56:8.1.2_2: ‘taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran’ti vā ‘aññaṁ jīvaṁ aññaṁ sarīran’ti vā,
sn56:8.1.2_3: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn56:8.1.2_4: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn56:8.1.2_5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā.
sn56:8.1.4_2: cintā atthasaṁhitā nādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:8.2.3_4: esā nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:9.1.4_2: kathā atthasaṁhitā nādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:10.1.2_2: annakathaṁ pānakathaṁ vatthakathaṁ sayanakathaṁ mālākathaṁ gandhakathaṁ,
sn56:10.1.2_3: ñātikathaṁ yānakathaṁ gāmakathaṁ nigamakathaṁ nagarakathaṁ janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ sūrakathaṁ visikhākathaṁ kumbhaṭṭhānakathaṁ,
sn56:10.1.4_2: kathā atthasaṁhitā nādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.

sn56:11.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn56:11.1.2_0: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56:11.2.3_0: Yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
sn56:11.2.3_1: yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito.
sn56:11.2.4_2: ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:11.3.1_2: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati?
sn56:11.3.3_0: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
sn56:11.3.4_2: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:11.4.1_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
sn56:11.4.2_6: yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ—saṅkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā.
sn56:11.4.3_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
sn56:11.4.4_0: yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
sn56:11.4.6_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
sn56:11.4.7_0: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
sn56:11.4.8_0: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ—
sn56:11.5.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapādi.
sn56:11.5.3_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññātan’ti me,
sn56:11.6.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapādi.
sn56:11.6.3_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahīnan’ti me,
sn56:11.7.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapādi.
sn56:11.7.3_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikatan’ti me,
sn56:11.8.2_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti me,
sn56:11.8.3_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvitan’ti me,
sn56:11.9.1_2: imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ na suvisuddhaṁ ahosi,
sn56:11.9.1_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn56:11.10.1_2: imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ suvisuddhaṁ ahosi, athāhaṁ,
sn56:11.10.1_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn56:11.10.3_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn56:11.10.5_0: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
sn56:11.11.1_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
sn56:11.12.1_0: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ:
sn56:11.12.2_0: “etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena
sn56:11.12.2_1: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
sn56:11.12.3_0: Bhummānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ:
sn56:11.12.4_0: “etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ,
sn56:11.12.4_1: appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
sn56:11.12.5_0: Cātumahārājikānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā tāvatiṁsā devā …pe…
sn56:11.12.11_0: “etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena
sn56:11.12.11_1: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
sn56:11.13.1_0: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
sn56:11.13.2_1: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṁ devānubhāvanti.
sn56:11.14.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
sn56:11.14.2_0: “aññāsi vata bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata bho, koṇḍañño”ti.
sn56:11.14.3_0: Iti hidaṁ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño” tveva nāmaṁ ahosīti.

sn56:13.4.2_0: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo—
sn56:13.5.4_0: idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ.

sn56:15.1.1_0: “Dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56:15.1.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:15.1.3_0: “ahaṁ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56:15.1.4_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56:15.1.5_0: “Dukkhaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56:15.1.6_0: dukkhasamudayaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dutiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56:15.1.7_0: dukkhanirodhaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā tatiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56:15.1.8_0: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi.
sn56:15.1.9_0: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56:15.2.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56:15.2.3_0: Dukkhaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56:15.2.4_0: dukkhasamudayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā dutiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56:15.2.5_0: dukkhanirodhaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā tatiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56:15.2.6_0: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā kho, bhikkhu, mayā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi.
sn56:15.2.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, dhārehi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56:16.1.1_0: “Dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56:16.1.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:16.1.3_0: “ahaṁ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56:16.2.1_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56:16.2.2_0: “Dukkhaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi.
sn56:16.2.3_0: Yo hi koci, bhante, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:16.2.4_0: ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ.
sn56:16.2.5_0: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56:16.2.8_0: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi.
sn56:16.2.9_0: Yo hi koci, bhante, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:16.2.10_0: ‘netaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ.
sn56:16.2.11_0: Ahametaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56:16.2.13_0: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56:16.3.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56:16.3.3_0: Dukkhaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi.
sn56:16.3.4_0: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:16.3.5_0: ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ.
sn56:16.3.6_0: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56:16.3.10_0: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā kho, bhikkhu, mayā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi.
sn56:16.3.11_0: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:16.3.12_0: ‘netaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ.
sn56:16.3.13_0: Ahametaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56:16.3.15_0: Evaṁ kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhārehi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56:17.1.1_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:18.1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn56:18.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:19.1.2_0: Tattha aparimāṇā vaṇṇā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā saṅkāsanā:
sn56:19.1.6_0: ‘idaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti, bhikkhave, mayā paññattaṁ.
sn56:19.1.7_0: Tattha aparimāṇā vaṇṇā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā saṅkāsanā:
sn56:20.1.7_0: imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
sn56:21.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati koṭigāme.
sn56:21.1.3_2: ariyasaccānaṁ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.
sn56:21.2.2_2: ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.
sn56:21.2.5_0: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.
sn56:21.3.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn56:22.1.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
sn56:22.1.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn56:22.1.2_3: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn56:22.2.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti,
sn56:22.2.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn56:22.2.2_3: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn56:22.3.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn56:23.1.6_2: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato ‘arahaṁ sammāsambuddho’ti vuccati.
sn56:24.1.2_3: sabbe te cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtaṁ abhisambujjhiṁsu.
sn56:24.1.3_3: sabbe te cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtaṁ abhisambujjhissanti.
sn56:24.1.4_3: sabbe te cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtaṁ abhisambujjhanti.
sn56:24.2.3_0: Ye hi, keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā yathābhūtaṁ abhisambujjhiṁsu …pe…
sn56:24.2.5_0: abhisambujjhanti, sabbe te imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtaṁ abhisambujjhanti.
sn56:25.1.1_0: “Jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato apassato.
sn56:25.1.2_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn56:25.1.3_3: ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
sn56:25.1.3_4: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
sn56:25.1.3_5: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn56:25.1.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn56:26.1.1_3: ye ca sotabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ—mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā—te vo,
sn56:26.1.1_5: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamayāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
sn56:26.2.3_3: ye ca sotabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ—mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā—te vo,
sn56:26.2.3_5: imesaṁ catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamayāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
sn56:27.1.4_0: imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni;
sn56:28.1.4_0: Sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo;
sn56:30.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā therā bhikkhū cetesu viharanti sahañcanike.
sn56:30.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ maṇḍalamāḷe
sn56:30.2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā gavampati thero bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn56:30.2.2_0: “sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
sn56:30.2.4_0: Yo dukkhasamudayaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati,
sn56:30.2.5_0: Yo dukkhanirodhaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati,
sn56:30.2.6_0: Yo dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati,
sn56:31.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati sīsapāvane.
sn56:31.1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56:31.1.5_0: yāni vā mayā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni yadidaṁ upari sīsapāvane”ti?
sn56:31.1.6_0: “Appamattakāni, bhante, bhagavatā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni;
sn56:31.1.7_0: atha kho etāneva bahutarāni yadidaṁ upari sīsapāvane”ti.
sn56:31.1.8_0: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, etadeva bahutaraṁ yaṁ vo mayā abhiññāya anakkhātaṁ.
sn56:31.1.10_2: atthasaṁhitaṁ nādibrahmacariyakaṁ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati;
sn56:31.3.2_2: atthasaṁhitaṁ etaṁ ādibrahmacariyakaṁ etaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati;
sn56:32.1.2_3: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—
sn56:32.2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ khadirapattānaṁ vā saralapattānaṁ vā āmalakapattānaṁ vā puṭaṁ karitvā udakaṁ vā tālapattaṁ vā āharissāmī’ti—
sn56:32.2.4_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:32.2.5_1: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—
sn56:32.3.1_0: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:32.3.2_3: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—
sn56:32.4.2_0: ‘ahaṁ padumapattānaṁ vā palāsapattānaṁ vā māluvapattānaṁ vā puṭaṁ karitvā udakaṁ vā tālapattaṁ vā āharissāmī’ti—
sn56:32.4.4_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evaṁ vadeyya:
sn56:32.4.5_1: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—
sn56:33.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daṇḍo uparivehāsaṁ khitto sakimpi mūlena nipatati, sakimpi aggena nipatati;
sn56:33.1.2_2: avijjānīvaraṇā sattā taṇhāsaṁyojanā sandhāvantā saṁsarantā sakimpi asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchanti,
sn56:33.1.2_3: sakimpi parasmā lokā imaṁ lokaṁ āgacchanti.
sn56:34.1.1_0: “Āditte, bhikkhave, cele vā sīse vā kimassa karaṇīyan”ti?
sn56:34.1.2_2: tasseva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyan”ti.
sn56:34.2.1_2: celaṁ vā sīsaṁ vā ajjhupekkhitvā amanasikaritvā anabhisametānaṁ catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamayāya
sn56:34.2.1_3: adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyaṁ.
sn56:35.1.4_2: divase divase tīhi tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno vassasatāyuko vassasatajīvī vassasatassa accayena anabhisametāni cattāri ariyasaccāni abhisamessasī’ti.
sn56:35.2.4_0: pubbā koṭi nappaññāyati sattippahārānaṁ asippahārānaṁ usuppahārānaṁ pharasuppahārānaṁ.
sn56:35.2.6_3: saha domanassena catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ abhisamayaṁ vadāmi;
sn56:35.2.7_0: api cāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sahāva sukhena, sahāva somanassena catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ abhisamayaṁ vadāmi.
sn56:36.1.1_2: puriso yaṁ imasmiṁ jambudīpe tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ tacchetvā ekajjhaṁ saṁhareyya;
sn56:36.1.3_0: Sūlaṁ karitvā ye mahāsamudde mahantakā pāṇā te mahantakesu sūlesu āvuneyya,
sn56:36.1.3_1: ye mahāsamudde majjhimakā pāṇā te majjhimakesu sūlesu āvuneyya,
sn56:36.1.3_2: ye mahāsamudde sukhumakā pāṇā te sukhumakesu sūlesu āvuneyya.
sn56:36.1.4_0: Apariyādinnā ca, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde oḷārikā pāṇā assu.
sn56:36.2.1_0: Atha imasmiṁ jambudīpe tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya.
sn56:36.2.2_0: Ito bahutarā kho, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde sukhumakā pāṇā, ye na sukarā sūlesu āvunituṁ.
sn56:36.2.6_2: apāyasmā parimutto diṭṭhisampanno puggalo ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe…
sn56:37.1.1_0: “Sūriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—aruṇuggaṁ.
sn56:37.1.2_2: bhikkhuno catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamayāya etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ,
sn56:38.1.1_3: neva tāva mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa.
sn56:38.1.3_0: Neva tāva rattindivā paññāyanti, na māsaddhamāsā paññāyanti, na utusaṁvaccharā paññāyanti.
sn56:38.2.1_3: atha mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa.
sn56:38.2.2_0: Neva andhakāratamaṁ tadā hoti na andhakāratimisā.
sn56:38.2.3_0: Atha rattindivā paññāyanti, māsaddhamāsā paññāyanti, utusaṁvaccharā paññāyanti.
sn56:38.2.4_2: yāvakīvañca tathāgato loke nuppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho,
sn56:38.2.4_3: neva tāva mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa.
sn56:38.2.6_0: Neva tāva catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ācikkhaṇā hoti desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṁ.
sn56:38.3.1_3: atha mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa.
sn56:38.3.2_0: Neva andhatamaṁ tadā hoti na andhakāratimisā.
sn56:38.3.3_0: Atha kho catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ācikkhaṇā hoti desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṁ.
sn56:39.1.1_0: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn56:39.1.2_1: te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṁ ullokenti:
sn56:39.1.3_0: ‘ayaṁ nūna bhavaṁ jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passatī’ti.
sn56:39.2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tūlapicu vā kappāsapicu vā lahuko vātūpādāno same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto.
sn56:39.2.5_2: ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn56:39.2.6_1: te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṁ ullokenti:
sn56:39.2.7_0: ‘ayaṁ nūna bhavaṁ jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passatī’ti.
sn56:39.3.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti …pe…
sn56:39.3.2_1: te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṁ ullokenti:
sn56:39.3.3_0: ‘ayaṁ nūna bhavaṁ jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passatī’ti.
sn56:39.4.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī.
sn56:39.4.2_0: Puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi,
sn56:39.4.2_1: neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya;
sn56:39.4.2_4: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi,
sn56:39.4.2_5: neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya.
sn56:39.4.5_2: ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti …pe…
sn56:39.4.6_1: te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṁ ullokenti:
sn56:39.4.7_0: ‘ayaṁ nūna bhavaṁ jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passatī’ti.
sn56:40.1.1_0: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe…
sn56:40.1.2_1: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī:
sn56:40.1.3_1: taṁ vata sahadhammena saṅkampessati vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn56:40.1.6_0: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī:
sn56:40.1.7_1: taṁ vata sahadhammena saṅkampessati vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn56:40.2.2_0: Tassassu aṭṭha kukku heṭṭhā nemaṅgamā, aṭṭha kukku uparinemassa.
sn56:40.2.3_0: Puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi,
sn56:40.2.3_1: neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya;
sn56:40.2.3_4: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi,
sn56:40.2.3_5: neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya.
sn56:40.2.6_2: yo hi koci bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe…
sn56:40.2.7_0: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī ‘vādamassa āropessāmī’ti,
sn56:40.2.7_1: taṁ vata sahadhammena saṅkampessati vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn56:40.2.10_0: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī:
sn56:40.2.10_2: taṁ vata sahadhammena saṅkampessati vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn56:41.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn56:41.1.3_2: aññataro puriso rājagahā nikkhamitvā ‘lokacintaṁ cintessāmī’ti yena sumāgadhā pokkharaṇī tenupasaṅkami;
sn56:41.1.3_3: upasaṅkamitvā sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre nisīdi lokacintaṁ cintento.
sn56:41.1.4_2: so puriso sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre caturaṅginiṁ senaṁ bhisamuḷālaṁ pavisantaṁ.
sn56:41.1.7_0: Yaṁ loke natthi taṁ mayā diṭṭhan’ti.
sn56:41.2.1_0: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso nagaraṁ pavisitvā mahājanakāyassa ārocesi:
sn56:41.2.3_0: Yaṁ loke natthi taṁ mayā diṭṭhan’ti.
sn56:41.2.4_0: ‘Kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, ambho purisa, ummatto kathaṁ viceto?
sn56:41.2.5_0: Kiñca loke natthi yaṁ tayā diṭṭhan’ti?
sn56:41.2.6_1: rājagahā nikkhamitvā “lokacintaṁ cintessāmī”ti yena sumāgadhā pokkharaṇī tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
sn56:41.2.6_2: upasaṅkamitvā sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre nisīdiṁ lokacintaṁ cintento.
sn56:41.2.7_0: Addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre caturaṅginiṁ senaṁ bhisamuḷālaṁ pavisantaṁ.
sn56:41.2.8_0: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, ummatto evaṁ viceto.
sn56:41.2.9_0: Idañca loke natthi yaṁ mayā diṭṭhan’ti.
sn56:41.2.10_0: ‘Taggha tvaṁ, ambho purisa, ummatto taggha viceto.
sn56:41.2.11_0: Idañca loke natthi yaṁ tayā diṭṭhan’ti.
sn56:41.3.1_0: Taṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, so puriso bhūtaṁyeva addasa, no abhūtaṁ.
sn56:41.3.3_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme devā jiniṁsu, asurā parājiniṁsu.
sn56:41.3.4_0: Parājitā ca kho, bhikkhave, asurā bhītā bhisamuḷālena asurapuraṁ pavisiṁsu devānaṁyeva mohayamānā.
sn56:41.4.2_2: ‘taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran’ti vā ‘aññaṁ jīvaṁ aññaṁ sarīran’ti vā,
sn56:41.4.2_3: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn56:41.4.2_4: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn56:41.4.2_5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā.
sn56:41.4.4_2: cintā atthasaṁhitā nādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:41.5.3_2: cintā atthasaṁhitā esā ādibrahmacariyakā esā nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn56:42.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn56:42.1.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn56:42.1.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena paṭibhānakūṭo tenupasaṅkami.
sn56:42.1.6_0: Addasā kho aññataro bhikkhu paṭibhānakūṭe mahantaṁ papātaṁ.
sn56:42.1.8_0: “mahā vatāyaṁ, bhante, papāto subhayānako, bhante, papāto.
sn56:42.1.9_0: Atthi nu kho, bhante, imamhā papātā añño papāto mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti?
sn56:42.1.10_0: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, imamhā papātā añño papāto mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti.
sn56:42.2.1_0: “Katamo pana, bhante, imamhā papātā añño papāto mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti?
sn56:42.2.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
sn56:42.2.4_0: Te jātisaṁvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiratā jarāsaṁvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiratā maraṇasaṁvattanikesu
sn56:42.2.5_0: Te jātisaṁvattanikepi saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharitvā jarāsaṁvattanikepi saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharitvā maraṇasaṁvattanikepi
sn56:42.2.6_0: Te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn56:42.3.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti …pe…
sn56:42.3.5_0: Te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn56:43.1.2_0: Tattha yaṁ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
sn56:43.2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:43.2.2_0: “mahā vata so, bhante, pariḷāho, sumahā vata so, bhante, pariḷāho.
sn56:43.2.3_0: Atthi nu kho, bhante, etamhā pariḷāhā añño pariḷāho mahantataro ceva bhayānakataro cā”ti?
sn56:43.2.4_0: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, etamhā pariḷāhā añño pariḷāho mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti.
sn56:43.3.1_0: “Katamo pana, bhante, etamhā pariḷāhā añño pariḷāho mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti?
sn56:43.3.2_0: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn56:43.3.6_0: Te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn56:43.4.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti …pe…

sn56:44.1.2_1: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—

sn56:44.2.5_1: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yathābhūtaṁ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī’ti—

sn56:45.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn56:45.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn56:45.1.3_0: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando sambahule licchavikumārake santhāgāre upāsanaṁ karonte,
sn56:45.1.6_0: yatra hi nāma dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipātessanti poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitan”ti.
sn56:45.2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando vesāliṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn56:45.2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56:45.2.2_0: “idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
sn56:45.2.3_1: sambahule licchavikumārake santhāgāre upāsanaṁ karonte dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipātente poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ.
sn56:45.2.6_0: yatra hi nāma dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipātessanti poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitan’”ti.
sn56:45.3.2_0: katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā—
sn56:45.3.3_0: yo dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ,
sn56:45.3.3_1: yo vā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyā”ti?
sn56:45.3.4_1: dukkaratarañceva durabhisambhavatarañca yo vā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyā”ti.
sn56:46.1.1_3: yatthamimesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ evaṁmahiddhikānaṁ evaṁ mahānubhāvānaṁ ābhāya nānubhontī”ti.

sn56:47.1.1_4: So vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjeyya.
sn56:47.1.3_0: api nu kho kāṇo kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjanto amusmiṁ ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvaṁ paveseyyā”ti?
sn56:47.1.4_0: “Yadi nūna, bhante, kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayenā”ti.
sn56:47.2.1_2: kāṇo kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjanto amusmiṁ ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvaṁ paveseyya,
sn56:47.3.2_0: Na hettha, bhikkhave, atthi dhammacariyā, samacariyā, kusalakiriyā, puññakiriyā.
sn56:48.1.4_0: Tatrassa kāṇo kacchapo. So vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjeyya.
sn56:48.1.6_0: api nu kho kāṇo kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjanto amusmiṁ ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvaṁ paveseyyā”ti?
sn56:48.1.7_1: yaṁ so kāṇo kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṁ sakiṁ ummujjanto amusmiṁ ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvaṁ paveseyyā”ti.
sn56:48.2.2_0: Evaṁ adhiccamidaṁ, bhikkhave, yaṁ tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
sn56:48.2.3_0: Evaṁ adhiccamidaṁ, bhikkhave, yaṁ tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbati.
sn56:49.1.1_2: puriso sinerussa pabbatarājassa satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhipeyya.
sn56:49.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yā vā satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā,
sn56:49.1.6_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti sinerupabbatarājānaṁ upanidhāya satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā”ti.
sn56:49.1.7_2: ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ;
sn56:49.1.8_3: purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya yadidaṁ sattakkhattuparamatā;
sn56:50.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yaṁ vā sinerussa pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ,
sn56:50.1.3_1: yā vā satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā”ti?
sn56:50.1.4_0: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ sinerussa pabbatarājassa yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ;
sn56:50.1.6_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti sinerussa pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā”ti.
sn56:50.1.7_2: ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ;
sn56:50.1.8_3: purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya yadidaṁ sattakkhattuparamatā;
sn56:51.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56:51.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56:51.1.4_2: appamattakāyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
sn56:51.1.5_2: kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
sn56:51.1.6_2: ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ;
sn56:51.1.7_2: kalabhāgampi na upeti purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya yadidaṁ sattakkhattuparamatā;
sn56:52.1.4_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yaṁ vā kusaggena ubbhataṁ, yaṁ vā pokkharaṇiyā udakan”ti?
sn56:52.1.5_0: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ, yadidaṁ—pokkharaṇiyā udakaṁ; appamattakaṁ kusaggena udakaṁ ubbhataṁ.
sn56:52.1.6_2: kalabhāgampi na upeti pokkharaṇiyā udakaṁ upanidhāya kusaggena udakaṁ ubbhatan”ti.
sn56:53.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yatthimā mahānadiyo saṁsandanti samenti, seyyathidaṁ—
sn56:53.1.2_0: gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, tato puriso dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni uddhareyya.
sn56:53.1.4_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni, yaṁ vā sambhejjaudakan”ti?
sn56:53.1.5_3: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni.
sn56:53.1.6_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti saṁbhejjaudakaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatānī”ti.
sn56:54.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yatthimā mahānadiyo saṁsandanti samenti, seyyathidaṁ—
sn56:54.1.2_3: ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni.
sn56:54.1.4_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yaṁ vā saṁbhejjaudakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ,
sn56:54.1.4_1: yāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti?
sn56:54.1.5_2: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni.
sn56:54.1.6_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti saṁbhejjaudakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti.
sn56:55.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāpathaviyā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhipeyya.
sn56:55.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yā vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā, ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56:55.1.5_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā”ti.
sn56:56.1.1_2: mahāpathavī parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā.
sn56:56.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yaṁ vā mahāpathaviyā parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ,
sn56:56.1.3_1: yā vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā avasiṭṭhā”ti?
sn56:56.1.5_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti mahāpathaviyā parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā avasiṭṭhā”ti.
sn56:57.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāsamuddato dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni uddharitāni.

sn56:57.1.4_3: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni.
sn56:57.1.5_2: kalabhāgampi na upenti mahāsamudde udakaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatānī”ti.
sn56:58.1.1_2: mahāsamudde udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni.
sn56:58.1.3_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—yaṁ vā mahāsamudde udakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ,
sn56:58.1.3_1: yāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti?
sn56:58.1.4_1: bahutaraṁ mahāsamudde udakaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādinnaṁ;
sn56:58.1.4_2: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni.

sn56:62.1.4_3: appamattakāyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.

sn56:102.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56:102.1.2_0: “taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ—
sn56:102.1.3_0: yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56:102.1.6_0: appamattakāyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
sn56:102.1.7_2: kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
